Reviews.Title: “We could see the Eifel Tower from the balcony”
Reviews.Author: travellinglawyer2011
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel night short weekend stay paris time location biggest selling designer shops rue saint honore 5 minutes walk madeline square concorde looked hotel staff friendly accommodating receptionist happy recommend restaurants directions themselves nicely finished top floor balcony view eifel tower amazing especially night clean looked plus breakfast delivered sunday morning wide selection pastries coffee juice negatives note little location probably expected bathroom improved glass door doesnt offer privacy potentially lethal middle night forget closed despite curtain drawn water runs floor shower slightly disappointing means major recommend stay visiting paris happily stay worth booking luxury hotels world

Reviews.Title: “Book again in a second!”
Reviews.Author: GinoSF
Reviews.Content: family stayed 5 nights time paris satisfied location ideal walking blocks champs élysées suprisingly quiet night wonderful perfectly appointed chrome fixtures heated towel rack plasma tv free wifi bonus private balcony enjoyed nice view provided complete duvet 2 staff extremely helpful spoke english kindly provided directions day trip ideas stay thanks gino

Reviews.Title: “Great place for a weekend trip”
Reviews.Author: nettie1
Reviews.Content: pavillon des nestled district paris attractive boutiquestyle hotel ideal short trip city lights comfortable little bathroom spacious wellappointed located easy walking distance champs delysee hotel hustle bustle city quiet restful busy days sightseeing breakfast delicious somewhat pricey reception staff friendly helpful lounge welcoming fire

Reviews.Title: “Professional and so...charming!”
Reviews.Author: htoussaint
Reviews.Content: nice hotel architecture amazing staff location perfect close else smart breakfast excellent times paris ive definitely stay visit business nice refuge recommend absolutely

Reviews.Title: “would stay here again”
Reviews.Author: xolidot
Reviews.Content: nice hotel updating staff exceptionally helpful especially frederique diana pity cant breakfast lounge staff sour unhelpful hotel free shuttle disney takes 5 mins shopping la outlet mall front hotel unlike rating hotel found beds comfortable prefer hard mattress bedding reasonable threadcount 3star hotel

Reviews.Title: “Not a great stay for our last night in Paris”
Reviews.Author: TravelersofOZ
Reviews.Content: adhered reviewers comments booked expensive real didnt bathroom split bed toilet glass sliding door didnt shut properly curtain sliding glass door bed experienced situation review booking luxury hotel 400pm check requesting 100pm check times eventually yes positive plus hotel found staff nice

Reviews.Title: “Modern but So Paris!”

Reviews.Content: stayed 3 4th april 2011 nice modern hotel junior suite facilities quality throughout staff care keen provide excellent service breakfast continental type supply loaded ipad useful location highly recommend boutique hotel
